'''Adam Martinsson''' was a content coordinator and one of the members of the Content Team of [[Mojang Studios]].<ref name=LinkedIn>https://www.linkedin.com/in/adam-martinsson-1a0a34b9/</ref>

== Biography ==
After going for a semester on a four-year MBA program, he went to Linköping University for one semester on a three-year system technology program.<ref name=LinkedIn/>

He started working at [[Mojang Studios]] on September 2015. A year later, he became a support agent on public-facing customer support via email & Twitter; internal process management; social media moderation; public message drafting as well as other customer support-related tasks and activities. On September 2017, he became a content coordinator on quality and brand review for both first and third party (UGC) content; playtesting; management of external creator groups; asset creation and review, along with many other similar tasks involving both internal and external projects.<ref name=LinkedIn/>

He currently lives in Stockholm, Sweden.
